columns.Name: Columns
columns.Hint: How many columns do you want? Changing this may require a grid clear.

rows.Name: Rows
rows.Hint: How many rows do you want? Changing this may require a grid clear.

reset.Name: Reset
reset.Hint: Clear the Grid entries. This action can not be undone.

display-as-drawer.Name: Display as Drawer
display-as-drawer.Hint: Display the GM Screen as a drawer on the bottom of the screen, as opposed to a normal dialog. If you want to use PopOut, set this to false.

clearConfirm.Title: Clear Grid
clearConfirm.Content: Are you sure you want to clear the grid entries? This action can not be undone.
